original_text:
I spoke to you in your prosperity,
    but you said, ‘I will not listen.’
This has been your way from your youth,
    that you have not obeyed my voice.
korean_text: 네가 평안할 때에 내가 네게 말하였으나 네 말이 나는 듣지 아니하리라 하였나니 네가 어려서부터 내 목소리를 청종하지 아니함이 네 습관이라

sentences.original_text: I spoke to you in your prosperity
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 네가 형통할 때에 네게 말하였으나

sentences.original_text: but you said, 'I will not listen.'
This has been your way from your youth
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 어린 때부터 네 길이 이러하여

sentences.original_text: that you have not obeyed my voice.
